line.text:
Planned Work
[FT]
[2] No trains between 3 Av-149 St and 96 St
[3] No trains running

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Late Nights, 10 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 11 - 15

[2] service operates in two sections:
1. Between 241 St and 3 Av-149 St, trains from 241 St skip Jackson Av
2. Between 96 St and Flatbush Av

[4] trains make all [3] stops between Nevins St and New Lots Av.

Travel Alternatives[TP]

[SB] buses operate along three routes:

[SB] Bronx Only Shuttle Bus from Jackson Av [2] and 149 St-Grand Concourse [4],
stopping at 3 Av-149 St [2].
[SB] Bronx-Manhattan Shuttle Bus between 3 Av-149 St [2] and 96 St [1] [2], stopping at
149 St-Grand Concourse [4], 145, 135, 125, 116, and 110 Sts.
[SB] Manhattan Shuttle Bus between 148 St and 96 St [1] [2], stopping at 145, 135, 125, 116, and 110

• Transfer between [2] trains and [SB] buses at 3 Av-149 St and/or 96 St.
• Transfer between [4] trains and [SB] buses at 149 St-Grand Concourse.
• Transfer between [2] and [4] trains at Franklin Av.

For service to Jackson Av, take the [2] to 3 Av-149 St where it will become a Wakefield-bound [2].
For service from this station, take a free [SB] bus.

Note: No [5] trains between E 180 St and Bowling Green.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Planned Work
[6] Brooklyn Bridge-bound trains skip 116, 110, 103, 96, 77, 68 and 51 Sts

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 11 - 15

For 103 St, use the M101 local, M102 or M103 buses.

For service to 116, 110, 96, 77, 68 and 51 Sts take the [6] to 59 St or Grand Central-42 St
and transfer to an uptown [4] local or [6].

For service from these stations, take the [4] or [6] to 59 St or 125 St
and transfer to a Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].

Alternate travel note:
Transfer between uptown and downtown trains with Unlimited Ride MetroCard at 86 St.

Note: Uptown platform at 103 St is closed for renovation.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[4] New Lots Av-bound trains skip 116, 110, 103, 96, 77, 68 and 51 Sts

Late Nights, 12:01 AM to 5 AM, Tue to Fri, Apr 12 - 15

For 103 St, use the M101 local, M102 or M103 buses.

For service to 116, 110, 96, 77, 68 and 51 Sts take the [4] to 59 St or Grand Central-42 St
and transfer to an uptown [4] local or [6].

For service from these stations, take the [4] or [6] to 59 St or 125 St
and transfer to a New Lots Av-bound [4].

Alternate travel note:
Transfer between uptown and downtown trains with Unlimited Ride MetroCard at 86 St.

Note: Uptown platform at 103 St is closed for renovation.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Planned Work
[7] Flushing-bound trains skip 33, 40, 46, 52, 69, 74, 82, 90, 103 and 111 Sts

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 11 - 15

For service to these stations, take the [7] to 61 St-Woodside, Junction Blvd or Willets Point and
transfer to a Hudson Yards-bound [7].

For service from these stations, take the [7] to Junction Blvd, 61 St-Woodside or Queensboro Plaza
and transfer to a Flushing-bound [7].

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: ACE
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/12/2016  2:13AM

Due to signal problems at Hoyt-Schermerhorn Sts, southbound [A] and [C] trains are running local from Hoyt-Schermerhorn Sts to Euclid Av.  

Planned Work
[E] World Trade Center-bound trains run express from 71 Av to Queens Plaza

Late Nights, 10:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 11 - 15

Trains stop at Roosevelt Av.

For service to 67 Av, 63 Dr, Woodhaven Blvd, Grand and Elmhurst Avs, take the [E] to Roosevelt Av and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E] local or Jamaica-bound [F]*.

For service to 65 St, Northern Blvd, 46, Steinway and 36 Sts, take the [E] to Queens Plaza
and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E] local.

For service from these stations, take the [E] or [F] to Roosevelt Av or 71 Av and transfer to a
World Trade Center-bound [E].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.




Planned Work
[E] World Trade Center-bound trains skip Briarwood and 75 Av

Late Nights, 9:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 11 - 15 • Apr 18 - 22

For service to these stations, take the [E] to Union Tpke or 71 Av and transfer
to a Jamaica Center-bound [E] or Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from Briarwood, take the [E] to Jamaica-Van Wyck and
transfer to a World Trade Center-bound [E].

For service from 75 Av, take the [E] or [F] to Union Tpke and transfer to a
World Trade Center-bound [E].

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Planned Work
[FF]
[F] Service operates in two sections
     Brooklyn-bound trains run via the [A] from W 4 St to Jay St-MetroTech

Late Nights, 12:15 AM to 5 AM, Tue to Fri, Apr 12 - 15

1. Between 179 St and Jay St-MetroTech and via the [A] to/from Hoyt-Schermerhorn.
2. Between Stillwell Av and Bergen St and via the [G] to/from Bedford-Nostrand Avs.

• Transfer at Hoyt-Schermerhorn to continue your trip.

No southbound [F] service at B'way-Lafayette St, 2 Av, Delancey St/Essex St and York St.

Travel Alternatives[TP]

For service to B'way-Lafayette St, take the [D]. Transfer between trains at W 4 St

For service from this station, take the [D] or [F] to W 4 St and transfer to a Brooklyn-bound [F]

For service to 2 Av and East Broadway, take the [F] to Jay St-MetroTech and transfer to a
Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from these stations, take the [F] to W 4 St and transfer to a Brooklyn-bound [F]

For Delancey/Essex St, take the [J]. Transfer between trains at Fulton St.

For York St, use nearby High St Station.




Planned Work
[F] Jamaica-bound trains run local from 21 St-Queensbridge to 71 Av

Late Nights, 10 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 11 - 15

Trains stop at 36, Steinway, 46 Sts, Northern Blvd, 65 St, Roosevelt,
Elmhurst, Grand Avs, Woodhaven Blvd, 63 Dr and 67 Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Work
[F] Manhattan-bound trains skip Sutphin Blvd, Briarwood and 75 Av

Late Nights, 9:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 11 - 15

For service to Sutphin Blvd, take the [F] to Union Tpke and transfer to a
Jamaica-bound [F].

For service to Briarwood and 75 Av, take the [F] to Union Tpke or 71 Av
and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E] or Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from Sutphin Blvd and Briarwood, take the [F] to Parsons Blvd
and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [F].

For service from 75 Av, take the [E] or [F] to Union Tpke and transfer to a
Manhattan-bound [F].




Planned Work
[D] Trains stop at 135 St in both directions

Late Nights, 12:01 AM to 5 AM, Tue to Fri, Apr 12 - 15

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Work
[D] Norwood-bound trains skip 25 St, Prospect Av, 4 Av-9 St and Union St

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 11 - 15

For service to these stations, take the [D] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer to a
Coney Island-bound [D] or [N].

For service from these stations, take the [D] or [N] to 36 St and transfer to a Norwood-bound [D].

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/12/2016  2:16AM

BX40 and BX42 buses are detoured due to paving on E. Tremont Av between Webster Av and Bathgate Av.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via East Tremont, right on 3 Av, left on 180 St, left on Webster Av, right on E. 178 St, right on Valentine Av and regular route.

Eastbound: Via E. Tremont Av, left on Webster Av, right on 180 St, right on 3 Av, left on E. Tremont and regular route.

All corresponding stops will be made along the detour route.

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/12/2016  2:17AM

Q59 buses are detoured in both directions due to milling on Queens Blvd from 63 St to Eliot Av.

Detour is as follows:

Eastbound: Q59 buses will terminate at Woodhaven Blvd

Westbound: Via Queens Blvd, left on Eliot Av, Left on Queens Blvd.

Q59 bus service will begin at Woodhaven Blvd.

All corresponding stops will be made along the detour route.

Allow additional travel time.

Until further notice

Due to construction, please use the nearby temporary stop on 42 Rd between Jackson Av and 28 St.

Until Apr 2016

Rockaway Point Blvd.

Click here for more detailed information about these changes.

Service Change  Posted: 03/15/2016 10:42AM

MPB - Rockaway Bound Ft. Tilden/Breezy Pt exit ramp closed through April due to planned work. Motorists must use the Riis Park/Far Rockaway exit. Signage is in place to direct motorists to a detour route. Expect delays.
